page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
In the area around Albrighton there are approximately 7,000 people.Of these approximately 3,000 are under 16 Of these 1,000 are not married. Which means that there are 1500 families in our area. It is thought that the 4,000 people of working age are employed in the following jobs,
A.Farming and agriculteral, 80. B.Doctor, dentists, etc, 32. C.Shops, 110. D.Banks, post office, library, 40. E.Railway workers, 10. F.Blacksmiths, 4. G.Timber merchants, 12. H.Licensing trade, 50. H.Garages, 25. I.Commercial, 100. L.Teaching and staff. TOTAL 585 22.5% of the working population work in our area .Of the remainder 16% are unemployed and the rest work else where.
